official_title: Efficacy and Implementation of Exercise-based Smoking Cessation Treatment for Adults with High Anxiety Sensitivity.
exclusion_criteria:
* Regular exercise defined as engaging in moderate-intensity exercise ≥3 days per week for ≥20 min each time;
* Receiving current intervention for smoking cessation.
* Outstanding debt to the YMCA
* Listed as a sex offender on the National Sex Offender Registry
